media/user/SCRAPE/test/2015-01-ultra-lite/extracted/ultra lite/07 View From On Top Of The Market St. Power Plant
Ultra Lite - Slang Term For Hip Murder demo 2014
Slang Term For Hip Murder demo 2014
Ultra Lite - Slang Term For Hip Murder demo 2014

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on January 15, 2015 Description from Terminal Escape:
It's entirely possible that ULTRA LITE is contrived art punk drivel, but I'm inclined to believe that Slang Term For Hip Murder is nothing short of a brilliant piece of outsider noise. Disjointed ramblings and questionably tuned everything combine with a carpet bombing of various and sundry sounds and snappy, snotty, fukk you vocals. Tracks like "Portrait Of The Artist As A Piece Of Shit" certainly imply these New Orleans mutants are very very aware of what they are doing, and it doesn't make it any less appealing. I can't really picture a band consciously trying to manufacture a SOCKEYE vibe, but this one comes close and adds a stylish erratic swagger (I'm talking about the title track here). File under whatever you like, digest at your own risk, I can assure you it sounds even better on the way out.  SLANG TERM FOR HIP MURDER
//3.bp.blogspot.com/-XGGktJuANv4/VLdjKJsbIdI/AAAAAAAALcE/2SBiVdzH2qw/s1600/ultra%2Blite%2Bcover.jpg http://ultralite.bandcamp.com/releases //2.bp.blogspot.com/-YHgGmi86ixo/VLdkr4O85yI/AAAAAAAALcQ/uVFyVxTaBFw/s1600/ultra%2Blite%2Bspine.jpg //1.bp.blogspot.com/-dWQOdY-Hbtk/VLdkxq5mQxI/AAAAAAAALcY/8DGn8o4K3Cc/s1600/ultra%2Blite%2Bimg.jpg
